blocks.name: minvecolem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ minveco . The set of all distances from points of ` Y ` to ` A ` are a nonempty set of nonnegative reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm minvecolem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnsb, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnmcv, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cba, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccphlo))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cin(cfv(css, c2), ccbn)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c1))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cims, c2))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cmopn, c8))
  -| wceq(c0, crn(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), wceq(c8, cfv(cims, c2)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), wceq(c9, cfv(cmopn, c8)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c8))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c9))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c7))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c8))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s1, c9))
  a1ii(wi(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  3jca(w0, wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))
  syl5eqss(c0, cr, crn(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))), w0)

  simprd(w0, wcel(c6, ccbn), wcel(c6, cfv(css, c2)))
  bnnv(c6)
  nvzcl(c6, cfv(cn0v, c6), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cn0v, c6))
  dmmpti(s1, cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))), c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))
  necon3bii(cdm(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))), emptycls, c0, emptycls)
  bitr4i(wceq(cdm(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))), emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))), emptycls))
  dm0rn0(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq1i(c0, emptycls, crn(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s0, c0, wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))), wral(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c5, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))))
  ralrimiva(s1, c5, w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(co(c7, c3, cv(s1)), c1))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(co(c7, c3, cv(s1)), c1), wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c7, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c2, cnv))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c7, c1))
  sselda(cv(s1), c5, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(c5, c1), wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c6, cfv(css, c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c2, ccphlo))
  phnv(c2)
  simpld(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(css, c2)), wcel(c6, ccbn))
  sylib(w0, wa(wcel(c6, cfv(css, c2)), wcel(c6, ccbn)), wcel(c6, cin(cfv(css, c2), ccbn)))
  elin(c6, cfv(css, c2), ccbn)
  sspba(c2, c6, cfv(css, c2), c5, c1)
  eqid(cfv(css, c2))
  nvmcl(c2, c7, c1, cv(s1), c3)
  nvge0(c2, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)), c1, c4)
  ax-mp(wb(wral(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c5, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))))), wral(s1, c5, wcel(cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))), universe)))
  rgenw(s1, c5, wcel(cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))), universe))
  fvex(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))

  eqid(cmpt(s1, c5, cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))))
  breq2(cv(s0), cfv(c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1))), nat0, cle)

  diff.cr.s(s1)

  diff.cle.s(s1)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, co(c7, c3, cv(s1)))

thm minvecolem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(-v ` c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(normCV ` c2)
  ⊣ c5 =(BaseSet ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈((SubSp ` c2)⋂ CBan))
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c8 =(IndMet ` c2)
  ⊣ c9 =(MetOpen ` c8)
  ⊣ c0 = ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, c9)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c9)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), c8 =(IndMet ` c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), c9 =(MetOpen ` c8))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s0, c6))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s0, c8))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s0, c9))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s1, c3))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s1, c4))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s1, c6))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s1, c7))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s1, c8))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s1, c9))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))), d(s0, w0))
  3jca(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ≠ ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0))
  syl5eqss(c0, cr, ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), w0)
  frnd((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))), cr, c5, w0)
  fmpttd(s1, c5, (c4 `(c7[c3]s1)), cr, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), (c4 `(c7[c3]s1))∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ NrmCVec, (c7[c3]s1)∈ c1)
  nvcl(c2, (c7[c3]s1), c1, c4)
  sylib(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, dom((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))≠ ∅)
  ne0d(dom((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), (0vec ` c6), w0)
  syl6eleqr((0vec ` c6), dom((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), c5, w0)
  3syl(w0, (0vec ` c6)∈ c5, c6 ∈ CBan, c6 ∈ NrmCVec)
  simprd(w0, c6 ∈ CBan, c6 ∈(SubSp ` c2))
  bnnv(c6)
  nvzcl(c6, (0vec ` c6), c5)
  eqid((0vec ` c6))
  dmmpti(s1, (s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))), c5, (c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))
  necon3bii(dom((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), emptycls, c0, emptycls)
  bitr4i(dom((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))= ∅, c0 = ∅, ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))= ∅)
  dm0rn0((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))
  eqeq1i(c0, emptycls, ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))))
  sylibr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, 0[≤]s0), ∀(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), 0[≤]s0))
  sylibr(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), 0[≤]s0), ∀(s1 ∈ c5, 0[≤](c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))
  ralrimiva(s1, c5, w0, 0[≤](c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), 0[≤](c4 `(c7[c3]s1)), c2 ∈ NrmCVec, (c7[c3]s1)∈ c1)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), (c7[c3]s1)∈ c1, c2 ∈ NrmCVec, c7 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ NrmCVec)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c5, c7 ∈ c1)
  sselda(s1, c5, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c5 ⊆ c1, c2 ∈ NrmCVec, c6 ∈(SubSp ` c2))
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ NrmCVec, c2 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
  phnv(c2)
  simpld(w0, c6 ∈(SubSp ` c2), c6 ∈ CBan)
  sylib(w0, (c6 ∈(SubSp ` c2)∧ c6 ∈ CBan), c6 ∈((SubSp ` c2)⋂ CBan))
  elin(c6, (SubSp ` c2), ccbn)
  sspba(c2, c6, (SubSp ` c2), c5, c1)
  eqid((SubSp ` c2))
  nvmcl(c2, c7, c1, s1, c3)
  nvge0(c2, (c7[c3]s1), c1, c4)
  ax-mp((∀(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), 0[≤]s0)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c5, 0[≤](c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c5,(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))∈ 𝕌))
  rgenw(s1, c5, (c4 `(c7[c3]s1))∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(c4, (c7[c3]s1))
  ralrnmpt(s1, s0, c5, (c4 `(c7[c3]s1)), universe, (s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))), 0[≤]s0, 0[≤](c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))
  eqid((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))
  breq2(s0, (c4 `(c7[c3]s1)), nat0, cle)
  raleqi(s0, c0, ran((s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))), 0[≤]s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, nat0, cle, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, cle, (c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈ c5 ↦(c4 `(c7[c3]s1))))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c5, (c4 `(c7[c3]s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, (c7[c3]s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c7, c3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: minvecolem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ minveco . Any two points ` K ` and ` L ` in ` Y ` are close to each other if they are close to the infimum of distance to ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2014.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm minvecolem2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, class c13, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c0, c1, c2), cexp, nat2), cle, co(nat4, cmul, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cba, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cnsb, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cnmcv, c5))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cba, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, ccphlo))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, cin(cfv(css, c5), ccbn)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c10, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c5))
  -| wceq(c11, cfv(cmopn, c1))
  -| wceq(c12, crn(cmpt(s0, c8, cfv(c7, co(c10, c6, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c13, cinf(c12, cr, clt))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c10, c1, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(co(c13, cexp, nat2), caddc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c10, c1, c2), cexp, nat2), cle, co(co(c13, cexp, nat2), caddc, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c10)

blocks.name: minvecolem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ minveco . The sequence formed by taking elements successively closer to the infimum is Cauchy. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2014.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: minvecolem4b
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ minveco . The convergent point of the cauchy sequence ` F ` is a member of the base space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: minvecolem7
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ minveco . Since any two minimal points are distance zero away from each other, the minimal point is unique. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: minveco
blocks.content: Minimizing vector theorem, or the Hilbert projection theorem. There is exactly one vector in a complete subspace ` W ` that minimizes the distance to an arbitrary vector ` A ` in a parent inner product space. Theorem 3.3-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 144, specialized to subspaces instead of convex subsets. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
